private: D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw

public: 558318636e51b6132cd6abb3

/**  HOW DOES IT WORK? **

=============== Adding and deleting scores ===============
 +----------------------------------------------------------+
 | Changes and updates to your leaderboard are made through |
 | simple http get requests using your private url.			|
 +----------------------------------------------------------+

1) A player named Carmine got a score of 100. If the same name is added twice, we use the higher score.
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw/add/Carmine/100


2) A player named Carmine got a score of 1000 in 90 seconds.
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw/add/Carmine/1000/90


3) A player named Carmine got a score of 1000 in 90 seconds and is Awesome.
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw/add/Carmine/1000/90/Awesome


4) Delete Carmine's score
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw/delete/Carmine


5) Clear all scores
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw/clear


6) Save a trip to the server by combining "add" with returning data: "add-pipe", "add-xml" or "add-quote"
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/D5rlNfqt4k-NIgu5teLOvAKKIbwS318k-WUjC7fm2zzw/add-pipe/Carmine/100


=============== Getting your scores =============== 

 +----------------------------------------------------------+
 |	Reading of data is performed by using your public url.  |
 +----------------------------------------------------------+

1) Get your data as XML:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/xml								


2) Get your data as json:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/json


3) Get your data as pipe delimited:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/pipe


4) Get your data as quoted with comma:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/quote


5) To get the list sorted by seconds (high to low) just add -seconds:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/xml-seconds


6) To sort ascending just add -asc:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/xml-seconds-asc


7) To get the list sorted by date (newest to oldest) just add -date:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/xml-seconds


8) To get only the top 5 or 10 rows, just add the number to the end:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/xml/5


9) To get a range of rows, use a starting number and count of rows you want
For instance, this is rows 100 to 149 (starts with number 0) :
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/xml/100/50


10) To get the score for just 1 person, just add -get and the person's name:
--> http://dreamlo.com/lb/558318636e51b6132cd6abb3/pipe-get/Carmine


**/
